rooms.title: A Look Inside
rooms.description-1: Wake up to natural light and step out onto a private balcony overlooking the serene surroundings.
rooms.description-2: A warm, inviting corner with soft lighting and plush bedding for a restful night’s sleep.
rooms.description-3: Functional workspace paired with direct balcony access — ideal for work or relaxation.
rooms.description-4: Smart TV, air conditioning, and thoughtful touches ensure a comfortable and connected stay.
rooms.description-5: Clean, modern bathroom with a walk-in shower and all essential toiletries provided.

pado.description: Just 8 minutes from Faliraki Beach, Pado Living offers a quiet, comfortable stay surrounded by greenery. A simple retreat close to everything you need.
